name: UGA CSCI x740
tagline: Real Time Scheduling and the Internet of Things
body:
# Welcome to the internet of things!

We are glad you are joining us for this new class based on CSCI 4740/6740. As you might have heard the internet of things (IoT) is becoming a large market. Many major companies such as Intel and IBM are investing large amounts of money into this new area of computing. 

[Lab Manual](https://bwbaze.gitbooks.io/uga-csci-x740-lab-manual/content/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
